bibl.title: Empedocles, On Nature I 233-364: A New Reconstruction of P. Strasb. gr. Inv. 1665-6.
bibl.note: P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)]. - 1. The Papyrus and its Importance. - 2. The Basis of the Present Reconstruction. - 3. A Summary of Empedocles' Argument. - Appendix: The Placing of Frr. g and h. - [Text, Apparatus and Translation.]
